long.ar,de,es,fi,fil,fr,id,it,ja,ko,nl,no,pl,:
Broom Cookie Cleaner - Your best FREE solution for cookies and history cleaning. Free Download and easy to use.
Hello and welcome to your experience with Broom. Broom is a cookie cleaner tool used for privacy and cleaning your browser from unwanted data that might interfere with your daily browsing.
Broom also cleans your history and many other options:

 - Cookie:
	HTTP cookies (also called web cookies, Internet cookies, browser cookies, or simply cookies) are small blocks of data created by a web server while a user is browsing a website and placed on the user's computer or other devices by the user's web browser.

- History:
	Your History page shows the web pages you've visited on Chrome in the last 90 days. It doesn't store Chrome pages you've visited like 
chrome://settings, pages you've visited in Incognito mode, or pages you've already deleted from your browsing history.

- Downloads:
	Your Downloads history is stored on your browser every time a user downloads something from the web.

- Cache: 
	Clearing the Cache and Cookies from a web browser is an important first step for almost any troubleshooting for internet browsing. 
	 The 'cache' is a tool used by your internet browser to speed up the page-loading process. However, sometimes it can cause a problem when websites are updated and developed as files saved in the cache may conflict with what's coded into the website.

- Passwords:
	Passwords are stored on your browser for future use, which may cause some problems as certain websites might attempt to get to your passwords.

- From Data:
	Form data is data stored on your browser for future use and an easier way to complete your forms, but also a way to not be private on the web.

	
Choose from multiple options for cleaning your browser and when to do it by using our intervals:

-Last hour
-Last 24 hours
-Last 4 weeks
-All time

Have more control over your privacy by cleaning what you would like, the whole browser or only your current tab.

Just add this to your chrome browser and protect your privacy by erasing your footprints from the web.

Also for other content please check our new website. https://toppost.ro/blog
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Broom Cookie Cleaner & Cookie Editor - Your best FREE solution for cookies and history cleaning and editing. Free Download and easy to use.
Hello and welcome to your experience with Broom. Broom is a cookie cleaner and a cookie editor tool used for privacy and cleaning your browser from unwanted data that might interfere with your daily browsing.
Broom also cleans your history and many other options:

 - Clear Cookies:
	Experience the internet at its best with our Clear Cookie Extension. Designed to optimize your online privacy, speed, and security, our extension is your key to a seamless digital journey. Say goodbye to unwanted cookies with a single click, streamlining your online experience. Tailor your privacy preferences with ease, striking the perfect balance between personalization and security. Stay ahead of potential threats with automatic updates, ensuring a protected browsing environment.

- Cookie Editor:
	Introducing our powerful Cookie Editor, designed to give you full control over your digital footprint. Explore the features that make our Cookie Editor a game-changer for a secure and personalized browsing experience. Edit, delete, or customize individual cookies for precise control over your browsing data. Seamlessly manage active sessions and optimize your online presence in real time. Intuitive design ensures easy navigation, making cookie editing accessible to all users.

- Clear History:
	Say goodbye to unwanted traces and streamline your online presence effortlessly. Discover the key features that make our Clear History tool the go-to solution for a pristine browsing record. Choose which browsing data to clear, giving you control over your online footprint. Automate the process with scheduled history removal, ensuring regular maintenance without manual intervention. Receive recommendations on what data to clear based on your browsing habits, optimizing the user experience.

- Clear Downloads History: 
	Uncover the features that make our tool essential for optimizing your download history, ensuring a seamless and organized online experience.Tailor your cleanup by choosing which download records to keep and which to remove.Enjoy a faster browser performance with our efficient download history cleanup.Customize download history preferences to align with your privacy needs.

- Clear Cache:
	Designed to refresh your digital presence, our tool empowers you to optimize browser performance and enhance privacy. Explore the features that make Clear Cache a must-have for every online enthusiast.Customize your cache cleanup by choosing which data to retain and which to clear. Enjoy faster website loading speeds and a smoother browsing experience.

- Clear Passwords:
	Elevate your online security with our Clear Passwords feature, designed to empower you with control over your digital credentials. Uncover the features that make our tool essential for a secure and organized password management experience. Safeguard your online presence by managing and securing your stored passwords.

- From Data
        Introducing our Clear Form Data feature, designed to enhance your online privacy and streamline your digital interaction experience. Discover the features that make our tool indispensable for maintaining a clean and secure form data environment. Enjoy a smoother browsing experience with organized and streamlined form data.
	
Choose from multiple options for cleaning your browser and when to do it by using our intervals:

-Last hour
-Last 24 hours
-Last 4 weeks
-All time

Have more control over your privacy by cleaning what you would like, the whole browser or only your current tab.

Just add this to your chrome browser and protect your privacy by erasing your footprints from the web.
